questions.question: What is the goal of the Salesman algorithm?

answers.a: A method to optimize traveling salesman route
answers.b: A way to book airline tickets
answers.c: A technique to pack for a long journey

questions.question: What is the main objective of the Salesman algorithm?

answers.a: To minimize the cost of travel
answers.b: To maximize the profit of the salesman
answers.c: To optimize the route taken by the salesman

questions.question: What is the time complexity of the Salesman algorithm?
Which of the following is not a constraint of the Salesman algorithm?

answers.a: The route must start and end at the same location
answers.b: Each location must be visited exactly once
answers.c: The route must cover all locations in any order

questions.question: What is the brute force approach to solve the Salemens problem?

answers.a: Generate all possible routes and select the shortest one
answers.b: Use a genetic algorithm to find the shortest route
answers.c: Implement a neural network to optimize the route
